src_original: yadāha /  katame ca te saṃsārapravartakāḥ kuśalamūlasaṃprayuktāḥ kleśāḥ /
tgt_original: 云何名為於輪迴中與煩惱合相續善根？

src_original: yaduta puṇyasaṃbhāraparyeṣṭyatṛptatā /
tgt_original: 所謂勤求福行而無厭足。

src_original: saṃcintyabhavopapattiparigrahaḥ /  buddhasamavadhānaprārthanā /  sattvaparipākāparikhedaḥ /  saddharmaparigrahodyogaḥ /  sattvakiṃkaraṇīyotsukatā /
tgt_original: 』菩薩作是思惟已，於三有中故現受生，願值諸佛誓度眾生而無懈倦護持正法，諸所施作勇進無退，常生法欲，永不棄捨波羅蜜多勝行。

src_original: ityete sāgaramate kuśalamūlasaṃprayuktāḥ kleśā yairbodhisattvāḥ saṃśliṣyante /
tgt_original: 此即名為於輪迴中與煩惱合相續善根。

src_original: na khalu kleśadoṣairlipyante /
tgt_original: 菩薩當於是中，雖合煩惱不為煩惱過失所染。

src_original: yadā bhagavan kuśalamūlāni tatkena kāraṇena kleśā ityucyante /
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 今說善根，何緣故說諸煩惱邪？

src_original: āha /
tgt_original: 」佛言：

src_original: tathā hi sāgaramate ebhirevaṃrūpaiḥ kleśairbodhisattvāstraidhātuke śliṣyante /  kleśasaṃbhūtaṃ ca traidhātukam /
tgt_original: 「海意！ 菩薩了知此如是等諸煩惱法與三界合，從煩惱中出生三界。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvā upāyakauśalena ca kuśalamūlavalānvādhānena ca saṃcintya traidhātuke śliṣyante /  tenocyante kuśalamūlasaṃprayuktāḥ kleśā iti /
tgt_original: 而彼菩薩具善巧方便故，積集善根緣力與三界合，此即名為諸有善根與煩惱合。

src_original: yāvadeva traidhātuke śleṣatayā na punaścittopakleśatayā /
tgt_original: 以其三界合故，即不復心生諸隨煩惱。

src_original: syādyathāpi nāma sāgaramate śreṣṭhino gṛhapatereka putraka iṣṭaḥ kāntaḥ priyo manāpo 'prakṛtikūlo darśanena sa ca dārako bālabhāvena nṛtyanneva mīḍhakūpe prapateta /  atha te tasya dārakasya mātṛjñātayaḥ paśyeyustaṃ dārakaṃ mīḍhakūpe prapatitam /
tgt_original: 海意！ 譬如世間有大長者唯有一子，慈育憐慜深加愛念。 時彼童子愚小無智，於穢井邊而為戲舞，以幼稚故忽墮井中。

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca gambhīraṃ niśvaseyuḥ śoceyuḥ parideveran /  na punastaṃ mīḍhakūpamavaruhya (Rgv 48)  taṃ dārakamadhyālamberan /
tgt_original: 爾時其母及彼親族，俱見其子墮穢井中，見已憂愁，競前觀井深不可測，徒極悲苦，無能為計入其井中，雖痛愛子不能救拔。

src_original: atha tasya dārakasya pitā taṃ pradeśamāgacchet /  sa paśyetaikaputrakaṃ mīḍhakūpe prapatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca śīghraśīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpa ekaputrakādhyāśayapremānunoto 'jugupsamānastaṃ mīḍhakūpamavaruhyaikaputrakamabhyutkṣipet
tgt_original: 是時其父知已奔至，見彼童子墮穢井中，臨視哀惱蒼惶旋轉，深愛此子不生厭捨，即設方計入其井中，善為救拔令子得出。

src_original: mīḍhakūpa iti sāgaramate traidhātukasyaitadadhivacanam /
tgt_original: 當知彼穢井者，即是三界；

src_original: ekaputraka iti sattvānāmetadadhivacanam /  sarvasattveṣu hi bodhisattvasyaikaputrasaṃjñā pratyupasthitā bhavati /
tgt_original: 其子即是一切眾生，菩薩觀於一切眾生如一子想；

src_original: mātṛjñātaya iti śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ pudgalānāmetadadhivacanaṃ ye saṃsāraprapatitān sattvān dṛṣṭvā śocanti paridevante na punaḥ śamarthā bhavantyabhyutkṣeptum /
tgt_original: 童子之母及親族者，即是聲聞、緣覺乘人，見諸眾生墮輪迴中，見已雖復心懷憂惱，無有方便而為救拔；

src_original: śreṣṭhī gṛhapatiriti bodhisattvasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yaḥ śucirvimalo nirmalacitto 'saṃskṛtadharmapratyakṣagataḥ saṃcintya traidhātuke pratisaṃdadhāti sattvaparipākārtham /
tgt_original: 彼大長者即是菩薩。 而諸菩薩雖以無垢潔白清淨之心住無為法，然復和合三界所修之行化度眾生。

src_original: seyaṃ sāgaramate bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā yadatyantaparimuktaḥ sarvabandhanebhyaḥ punareva bhavopapattimupādadāti /
tgt_original: 海意！

src_original: paśya sāgaramate dharmāṇāmasāratāmakārakatāṃ nirātmatāṃ niḥsattvatāṃ (Rgv 49)  nirjīvatāṃ niḥpudgalatāmasvāmikatām /  yatra hi nāma yatheṣyante tathā viṭhapyante viṭhapitāśca samānā na cetayanti na prakalpayanti /
tgt_original: 汝觀諸法無有實性，無作者性，無我性，無人性，無眾生性，無壽者性，無主宰性，隨欲所生，生已聚集，無所覺了，亦無分別。

src_original: imāṃ sāgaramate dharmaviṭhapanāmadhimucya bodhisattvo na kasmiṃściddharme parikhedamutpādayati /
tgt_original: 海意！ 若能解了此諸法生，即諸菩薩於諸法中無有少法而生懈倦。

src_original: tasyaiva jñānadarśanaṃ śuci śuddhaṃ bhavati /  nātra kaścidupakāro vāpakāro vā kriyata iti /
tgt_original: 若得如是知見清淨，諸所作中亦無饒益無不饒益，即能如實了知諸法平等之性。

src_original: evaṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  evaṃ ca mahākaruṇāsaṃnāhaṃ na tyajati /
tgt_original: 如是如實了知諸法平等性已，常不棄捨大悲之鎧。

src_original: syādyathāpi nāma sāgaramata'nargha viḍūryamaṇiratnaṃ svavadāpitaṃ supariśuddhaṃ suvimalaṃ kardamaparikṣiptaṃ varṣasahasramavatiṣṭheta /
tgt_original: 「海意！ 譬如世間琉璃珠寶，自體瑩潔淨無瑕翳，置塵穢中經於千歲；

src_original: tadvarṣasahasrātyayena tataḥ kardamādabhyutkṣipya loḍyeta payavadāyeta /  tatsudhautaṃ pariśodhitaṃ paryavadāpitaṃ samānaṃ tameva śuddhavimalamaṇiratnasvabhāvaṃ na jahyāt /
tgt_original: 過千歲已取之治事，去其塵穢滌浣清淨，依然瑩潔離諸瑕翳。

src_original: evameva sāgaramate bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ cittasya prajānāti /  tāṃ punarāgantuko pakleśopakliṣṭāṃ paśyati /
tgt_original: 菩薩亦復如是，了知眾生心之自性，本來清淨明澈潔白，但為客塵煩惱之所覆蔽。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩薩觀已，即作是念：

src_original: naite kleśāḥ sattvānāṃ cittaprakṛtiprabhāsvaratāyāṃ praviṣṭāḥ /  āgantukā ete kleśā abhūtaparikalpasamutthitāḥ /
tgt_original: 『眾生心性本來清淨，但為客塵煩惱之所覆蔽，而彼煩惱實無所住。

src_original: śaknuyāmahaṃ punareṣāṃ sattvānāmāgantukleśāpanayanāya dharma deśayitumiti /
tgt_original: 眾生橫起虛妄分別，我當為彼諸眾生類宣說斷除煩惱之法。

src_original: evamasya nāvalīyanācittamutpadyate /  tasya bhūyasyā mātrayā sarvasattvānāmantike pramokṣacittotpāda utpadyate /
tgt_original: 起無懈心，於眾生所轉復增勝，運心普令皆得解脫。

src_original: evaṃ cāsya bhavati /
tgt_original: 』又復思惟：

src_original: naiteṣāṃ kleśānāṃ kiṃcidvalaṃ sthāma vā /  abalā durbalā ete kleśāḥ /  naiteṣāṃ kiṃcidbhūtapratiṣṭhānam /  abhūtaparikalpita (Rgv 50) ete kleśāḥ /  te yathābhūtayoniśomanasikāranirīkṣitā na kupyanti /
tgt_original: 『此諸煩惱能壞眾生諸有力勢使令劣弱，此諸煩惱能令眾生於無實煩惱中虛妄分別，若能如實深固作意如理伺察者，彼即不為煩惱所動。

src_original: te 'smābhistathā pratyavekṣitavyā yathā na bhūyaḥ śliṣyeyuḥ /
tgt_original: 如所伺察已，即彼煩惱不復和合。

src_original: aśleṣo hi kleśānāṃ sādhurna punaḥ śleṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 若與煩惱不和合者，斯即為善。

src_original: yadyahaṃ kleśānāṃ ślipyeya tatkathaṃ kleśabandhanabaddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ kleśabandhanaprahāṇaya dharma deśayeyam /  hanta vayaṃ kleśānāṃ ca na śliṣyāmahe kleśabandhanaprahāṇāya ca sattvebhyo dharma śayiṣyāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 又復我今若與諸煩惱合，云何能為煩惱繫縛諸眾生等宣說斷除煩惱之法？ 故我今時不與諸煩惱合，應為煩惱繫縛眾生說斷除法。
